TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_balangbangan, title = balangbangan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/balangbangan} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:秋天) mabadi' ku papah nu kilang i Li-pun tu balangbangan. .
(kamo no holam:秋天) mabadi' ko papah no kilang i Li-pon to balangbangan. .
